events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system classified the issue as a refund request based on the customer's mention of returning the wrong item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll do my best to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with the refund?
Thank you for the quick response. My order number is 123456789, and I have attached a picture showing the incorrect item received.
Thanks for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and provide a return shipping label for the wrong item.
That sounds perfect, thank you for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the assistance.
The refund has been processed successfully, and the return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please let us know if you need further help.
We are following up to confirm that your refund was received and the return process went smoothly. Please contact us if you have any more questions.
Since there have been no further responses, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting us and have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey on your recent refund experience to help us improve our services.
